rooms.description: An open reception area with decorative tiles and Chettinad motifs.
Spacious living space with floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural light, featuring traditional Chettinad woodwork.
A dedicated dining area adjacent to the kitchen, designed with a blend of modern and traditional elements.
Well-equipped, functional kitchen with ample storage and integrated appliances, respecting Vastu for fire element placement.
A guest room offering comfort and privacy, incorporating traditional Chettinad design elements.
An open courtyard providing ventilation and natural light to surrounding areas, aligning with Vastu principles for prosperity.

openings.description: Stylish entrance that reflects Chettinad architecture, leading to the central courtyard.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room and dining area for optimal natural light.
